caption: Relating to grounds for the involuntary termination of the parent-child relationship.
last_action: 03/14/2025 H Referred to s/c on Family & Fiduciary Relationships by Speaker: Mar 14 2025  2:42PM
summary: This bill amends the Family Code regarding grounds for terminating parent-child relationships. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects all parents by updating conditions under which parental rights can be terminated, including child abandonment, endangerment, criminal conduct, substance abuse, and sexual offenses. The bill reorganizes and renumbers existing provisions without substantially changing the grounds for termination.
translation: 该法案修改了家庭法典中关于终止父母子女关系的条款。虽然并未特别针对中国移民，但该法案通过更新可终止父母权利的条件，影响所有父母，这些条件包括遗弃儿童、危害儿童、犯罪行为、药物滥用和性犯罪。该法案重新组织和重新编号了现有条款，但未实质性改变终止父母权利的依据。
